title: Lottery 点卷抽奖  无法添加其他MOD物品ID？
author: uiopwsp
txt_content:
错误报告日志

[04:50:22] [Server thread/ERROR]: Cannot load plugins\Lottery\creditLottery.yml
org.bukkit.configuration.InvalidConfigurationException: while scanning for the next token
found character         '\t' that cannot start any token
 in "<string>", line 30, column 13:
        ID: 4427        
                ^
